metalign.hierarchy

Class HierarchyModelState

  • java.lang.Object
    • metalign.generic.MidiModelState
      • metalign.hierarchy.HierarchyModelState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<MidiModelState>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FromFileHierarchyModelState, MetricalLpcfgHierarchyModelState

    public abstract class HierarchyModelState
extends MidiModelState
    A HierarchyModelState is used in beat hierarchy detection, and contains some representation of a song's hierarchy.
    Author:
    Andrew McLeod - 8 Sept, 2015

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected BeatTrackingModelState beatState
      The BeatTrackingModelState which we are modeling jointly with.
      protected VoiceSplittingModelState voiceState
      The VoiceSplittingModelState which these hierarchies will be based on.

        public abstract int getAnacrusis()
        Get the length of the anacrusis, measured in sub beats.
        Returns:
        The number of sub beats which fall before the first downbeat of this hierarchy.
